title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Nonlinear Polarization: Introduction, nonlinear electron oscillator model, nonlinear polarization and wave equation; Nonlinear Optical Processes: Second and third order parametric processes, phase-matching, saturation nonlinearity, stimulated Raman scattering, stimulated Brillouin scattering, optical phase conjugation, self-focusing; Nonlinear Optical Materials: Origin of nonlinearity, single crystals, polymers, photonic crystals, nanomaterials: Nonlinear Optics for Communication: Nonlinear fiber optics, temporal soliton, ultrashort pulse generation and its measurement, Photo refractive effect, optical bistability; Quantum Optics: Quantum theory of radiation, quantization of free electromagnetic field, Fock or number States, Lamb shift.
